channel.title: Need help with making npcs walk! 667/718
channel.description: ok so im just messin around on nrs3 and im wondering how to have npcs walk. ive messed with all kinds of stuff. everything that i thought would make them walk and nothing :( so if i could get some help i would greatly appreciate it. and ill rep++ lol. also one more thing. its not that big a deal to me but i cant get pets to work. if someone knows how to simply fix it that would be awesome.

item.title: Need help with making npcs walk! 667/718
item.dc:creator: @jefersonpang jefersonpang
item.description:
@jefersonpang wrote:

[quote=“Zonebird, post:5, topic:452591”]This is a really easy fix:

Go To Spawn-Config

Search The NPC ID you want to move.

Once you find the NPC ID

There should be a bunch of lines with numbers and stuff

At the top it well say something like this: // spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description

Where it says Walk Rate under it theres 0’s and 1’s

Put 1 for the NPc you want to walk.

Hope i helped

This is just if your using PI[/quote]ehh not using PI thanks tho.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making npcs walk! 667/718

item.title: Need help with making npcs walk! 667/718
item.dc:creator: @Zonebird Zonebird
item.description:
@Zonebird wrote:

This is a really easy fix:

Go To Spawn-Config

Search The NPC ID you want to move.

Once you find the NPC ID

There should be a bunch of lines with numbers and stuff

At the top it well say something like this: // spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description

Where it says Walk Rate under it theres 0’s and 1’s

Put 1 for the NPc you want to walk.

Hope i helped

This is just if your using PI

Read full topic
